overview: Ivan, a 15-year-old teenager, who works with his delivery bike pizza, he made a delivery to the bank surveillance booth, at which point You will witness an assault and the murder of the Policeman to whom you made the request. The Recordings from security cameras will be reviewed to find presumed guilty, but as there are so many surveillance cameras the search it will be a canon that goes over crime infinitely.
title: The Transference
